title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2213.26 - Program loan consolidation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2213.26 - Program loan consolidation

State Regulations

The corporation shall annually determine the availability
of program loan consolidation. In any year in which program loan consolidation
is available the corporation shall determine the terms of such program loan
consolidation for the academic year and with respect to program loans that are
otherwise eligible for purchase by a public benefit corporation, shall be
subject to the approval of such public benefit corporation, based on market
conditions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2213.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
